00402 #ifdef NDEBUG
00403 #define gan_image_bit_get_pix_4group(img,row,col)\
00404         (gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row],     col     ) && \
00405          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row],     (col)+1 ) && \
00406          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)+1], col     ) && \
00407          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)+1], (col)+1 ))
00408 #define gan_image_bit_get_pix_5group(img,row,col)\
00409         (gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)-1], col     ) && \
00410          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row],     (col)-1 ) && \
00411          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row],     col     ) && \
00412          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row],     (col)+1 ) && \
00413          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)+1], col     ))
00414 #define gan_image_bit_get_pix_9group(img,row,col)\
00415         (gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)-1], (col)-1 ) && \
00416          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)-1], col     ) && \
00417          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)-1], (col)+1 ) && \
00418          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row],     (col)-1 ) && \
00419          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row],     col     ) && \
00420          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row],     (col)+1 ) && \
00421          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)+1], (col)-1 ) && \
00422          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)+1], col     ) && \
00423          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)+1], (col)+1))
00424 #define gan_image_bit_get_pix_3group_horiz(img,row,col)\
00425         (gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row], (col)-1 ) && \
00426          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row], col     ) && \
00427          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row], (col)+1 ))
00428 #define gan_image_bit_get_pix_3group_vert(img,row,col)\
00429         (gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)-1], col ) && \
00430          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[row],     col ) && \
00431          gan_bit_array_get_bit ( &(img)->ba[(row)+1], col ))
00432 #else

00442                                              unsigned row, unsigned col );
